description: central green rectangle with linear organic design in black; four gold radiating arms extend out from center; ground is metallic bronze and turquoise, spotted and swirled; top and bottom bands of brown and gold shadowy forms
marks:

See signed on back at bottom center, in pencil: [What then/ a
medium: Photo copy, hand painting and collage on Japan papers
title: what then
